title: Spicy Quesadilla Sauce
directions: Mix mayonnaise, jalapeno peppers, 3 tablespoons of the pickling juice from the peppers, sugar, paprika, cumin, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, and salt together in a bowl.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate 4 to 6 hours before serving.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons canned diced jalapeno peppers, drained (reserve juice)
